properties.name: 102 S. Roupp
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey102 S. Roupp, Hesston, KSDad lived here from about 1978(?) until he went to Illinois to get his Master\'s. The satellite image shows houses here, but at the time Dad lived there, it was apartments. The apartments were leveled by a tornado on 13 MAR 1990.

properties.name: 12 Pheasant Run Road
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 12 pheasant run road, hesston, ksI lived here from February 1990 (last semester of high school) until I went to college. On 13 MAR 1990, a tornado passed by to the south, missing our house by about half a block.

properties.name: 203 S. Erb
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 221 Erb, Hesston, KSI lived here from age four-and-a-half to age six-and-a-half.

properties.name: 2209 N. Main
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 2300 Main, 67117I lived here from age seven-and-a-half until my sophomore year in high school.

properties.name: 330 E. 9th
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey I lived here from my sophomore year of high school (October 1988) until the second semester of my senior year (February 1990).

properties.name: 331 N. Oliver
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey331 N. Oliver, Wichita, KSDad and Ruth lived here from about 1985 until they left for North Dakota, in AUG 1990, which was just as I was leaving for college.

properties.name: 3403 Penley
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey3403 Penley, Wichita, KSDad lived here from about 1982(?) until about 1985. While living here he met and married Ruth.

properties.name: 8640 E. Harry
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey8640(?) E. Harry, Wichita, KSDad lived here from the time he moved back to Kansas after getting his Master\'s degree until he bought the house on Penley. Google Local couldn\'t find an actual location for this address (which I may have misremembered), and there are two apartment complexes in the place that I seem to think is right...I don\'t know which one really is right, if either, so this is really a guess. The complex was called "Windsor at Cedarbrooke" at the time.

properties.name: 8920 Briardale
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey8920 Briardale, Bismarck, NDDad and Ruth have lived here since AUG 1990. Joel and Matt grew up here.

properties.name: El Rose Manor
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 300 e. academy, hesston, ksI lived here from age two-and-a-half to age three-and-a-half. (I think.)

properties.name: First House We Ever Bought
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 14911 W. 85th Terrace, Lenexa, KSHome Sweet Home! We have lived here since 10 DEC 2000.

properties.name: First married home
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 4058 Warwick Apt. 8, Kansas City, MOMichelle and I lived here from 1998-ish until 10 DEC 2000.

properties.name: Grandma and Grandpa Beachey's House
properties.description: Posted by KendricbeacheyRural Arthur, ILGrandma and Grandpa Beachey lived here from before I was born until they died, in 2000 and 2002.

properties.name: Kansas State University
properties.description: Posted by KendricbeacheyManhattan, KSKansas State University was a land-grant college founded in 1863 as Bluemont College. The pointer in the map is centered on Anderson Hall, which is the administration building.

properties.name: McKinley Elementary School
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 1st and Pine, Newton, KSThis is where I went to grade school from 1st to 4th grade. It is no longer a functioning school (school district offices, last time I checked).

properties.name: Newton High School
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 900 W. 12th, Newton, KSThis is where I went to school from 9th grade to 12th grade.

properties.name: Santa Fe Middle School
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 7th and Poplar, Newton, KSI went to school here from 5th grade to 8th grade. At the time, there was another building in the northeast quadrant of the block where the pointer is. It was demolished in a big renovation in the late 1990s, because it would have been too difficult to bring it up to spec for the Americans With Disabilities Act. At the same time, the main building shown (which we at the time called the South Building) was completely gutted and reconfigured inside, although from the street it still has the same facade.

properties.name: Smith House
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 331 N. 17th St, Manhattan, KSI lived here all through college.

properties.name: The Duplex
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 213 Grandview, Newton, KSI lived here from age six-and-a-half to age seven-and-a-half.

properties.name: The Refugee Camp
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 8340 W. 108th Terrace, Overland Park, KSI lived here from the time I moved to Kansas City (02 JAN 1996) until I was about ready to get married (didn\'t renew my lease for 1999).

properties.name: Zerger's House
properties.description: Posted by Kendricbeachey 210 s. lancaster, hesston, ksI lived here from age three-and-a-half to age four-and-a-half.
